TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 为统一资源标识符 (URI) 提供自定义构造函数，并修改 类的 URI。

span.span: Provides a custom constructor for uniform resource identifiers (URIs) and modifies URIs for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种简便的方法来修改 实例的内容，而无需为每个修改创建新的 实例。The class provides a convenient way to modify the contents of a instance without creating a new instance for each modification. 属性提供对只读 属性的读/写访问权限，以便可以修改这些属性。The properties provide read/write access to the read-only properties so that they can be modified.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数创建 类的新实例，并按如下所示初始化其属性。The parameterless constructor creates a new instance of the class with its properties initialized as follows. |属性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |FragmentFragment|| |HostHost|回环"loopback"| |密码Password|| |PathPath|"/""/"| |端口Port|-1-1| |查询Query|| |SchemeScheme|http"http"| |UserNameUserName||

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string uri) cil managed

span.span: A URI string.

summary.span: 用指定的 URI 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用在 中指定的 、、、、、 和 `uri`属性来初始化 类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class with the , , , , , , and properties set as specified in `uri`. 如果 `uri` 未指定方案，则该方案默认为 "http："。If `uri` does not specify a scheme, the scheme defaults to "http:".

span.span: is .

span.span: The parser detected more than two consecutive slashes in a URI that does not use the "file" scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的初始化，并将 属性设置为 `schemeName`，并将 属性设置为 `hostName`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName` and the property set to `hostName`. 初始化为值-1 以指示应使用方案的默认端口，而 属性设置为斜杠字符（/）。 is initialized to the value -1 to indicate the default port for the scheme should be used, and the property is set to the slash character (/). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，其中包含 URI `http://www.contoso.com/`。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI `http://www.contoso.com/`. span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified scheme, host, and port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的初始化，并将 属性设置为 `schemeName`，将 属性设置为 `hostName`，将 属性设置为 `portNumber`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, and the property set to `portNumber`. 属性设置为斜杠字符（/）。The property is set to the slash character (/). 如果 `portNumber` 的值设置为-1，则表示将使用 `scheme` 的默认端口值连接到 `host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，其中包含 URI `http://www.contoso.com:8080/`。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI `http://www.contoso.com:8080/`. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder4 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的初始化时， 属性设置为 `schemeName`， 属性设置为 `hostName`， 属性设置为 `portNumber`，而 属性设置为 `pathValue`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, the property set to `portNumber` and the property set to `pathValue`. 如果 `portNumber` 的值设置为-1，则表示将使用 `scheme` 的默认端口值连接到 `host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，其中包含 URI `http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm`。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI `http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm`. summary.span: 用指定的方案、主机、端口号、路径和查询字符串或段标识符初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified scheme, host, port number, path and query string or fragment identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的初始化时， 属性设置为 `schemeName`， 属性设置为 `hostName`， 属性设置为 `portNumber`， 属性设置为 `pathValue`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, the property set to `portNumber`, and the property is set to `pathValue`. 如果 `extraValue` 以数字符号（#）开头，则 设置为 "`extraValue`"。If `extraValue` begins with a number sign (#), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果 `extraValue` 以问号（？）开头，则 设置为 "`extraValue`"。If `extraValue` begins with a question mark (?), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果 `portNumber` 的值设置为-1，则表示将使用 `scheme` 的默认端口值连接到 `host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 实例，其中包含 URI `http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top`。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI `http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top`. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 既不是 也不是 ，既不是以井号 (#) 开始的有效段标识符，也不是以问号 (?) 开始的有效查询字符串。

span.span: is neither nor , nor does a valid fragment identifier begin with a number sign (#), nor a valid query string begin with a question mark (?).
is less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 的段部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the fragment portion of the URI.
The fragment portion of the URI.

value.span: 段标识符 ("#") 添加到段的开头。

span.span: The fragment identifier ("#") is added to the beginning of the fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 URI 中片段标记（#）后的任何文本，包括标记本身。The property contains any text following a fragment marker (#) in the URI, including the marker itself. 设置 属性时，会将片段标记添加到其值。When setting the property, the fragment marker is added to its value. **注意**在 .NET Framework 的1.0 和1.1 版中，将 属性设置为任意值（包括 `null`，清除 属性），并将 属性设置为 `null` 或 清除属性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 但在版本2.0 中， 和 属性是独立的。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **注意**不要将字符串直接追加到此属性。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果 的长度大于1，则以字符串形式检索属性值，删除前导井号，追加新的查询字符串，并使用组合字符串设置属性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading pound sign, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 URI `"http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main"`。The following example creates the URI `"http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main"`. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回 URI 的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns the hash code for the URI.

span.span: The hash code generated for the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成哈希代码，但不包括任何片段。The hash code is generated without including any fragment. Uri `http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search` 和 `http://www.contoso.com/index.htm` 生成相同的哈希代码。The URIs `http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search` and `http://www.contoso.com/index.htm` generate the same hash code. 当 `true`Equals （B）时，可保证 A 和 B 的哈希代码是相同的。The hash codes for A and B are guaranteed to be the same when A.Equals(B) is `true`. 此方法实现 。This method implements .

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 引用的资源的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the resource referenced by the URI.

value.span: URI 引用的资源的路径。

span.span: The path to the resource referenced by the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含服务器用于解析信息请求的路径信息。The property contains the path information that the server uses to resolve requests for information. 通常，这是服务器文件系统上所需信息的路径;尽管它还可以指示服务器必须运行的应用程序或脚本以提供信息。Typically this is the path to the desired information on the server's file system; although it also can indicate the application or script that the server must run to provide the information. 路径信息不包括方案、主机名或 URI 的查询部分。The path information does not include the scheme, host name, or query portion of the URI. 属性始终返回至少一个斜杠（/）。The property always returns at least a slash (/).

member this.Port : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 的端口号。

span.span: Gets or sets the port number of the URI.
The port number of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 端口号定义用于联系 URI 中引用的主机的协议端口。The port number defines the protocol port for contacting the host referenced in the URI. 如果未将端口指定为 URI 的一部分，则 属性返回值-1，指示将使用协议方案的默认端口值连接到主机。If a port is not specified as part of the URI, the property returns the value of -1 to indicate that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host. 如果 属性的值设置为-1，则表明协议方案的默认端口值将用于连接到主机。If the property is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host.

exception.span: 不能将此端口设为小于 1 或大于 65,535 的值。

span.span: The port cannot be set to a value less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 中包括的任何查询信息。

span.span: Gets or sets any query information included in the URI.

value.span: URI 中包括的查询信息。

span.span: The query information included in the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含 URI 中包括的任何查询信息。The property contains any query information included in the URI. 查询信息由问号（？）与路径信息分隔开来，并继续到 URI 的结尾。Query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?) and continues to the end of the URI. 返回的查询信息包括前导问号。The query information returned includes the leading question mark. 查询信息根据 RFC 2396 进行转义。The query information is escaped according to RFC 2396. **注意**在 .NET Framework 的1.0 和1.1 版中，将 属性设置为任意值（包括 `null`，清除 属性），并将 属性设置为 `null` 或 清除属性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 但在版本2.0 中， 和 属性是独立的。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **注意**不要将字符串直接追加到此属性。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果 的长度大于1，则以字符串形式检索属性值，删除前导问号，追加新的查询字符串，并使用组合字符串设置属性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading question mark, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下面的示例设置 属性。The following example sets the property. [!code-cpp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cpp/main.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cs/main.cs#1)]

member this.Scheme : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 URI 的方案名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the scheme name of the URI.
The scheme of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 属性的有效方案名称。The following table lists the valid scheme names for the property. |SchemeScheme|说明Description| |------------|-----------------| |文件file|资源是本地计算机上的文件。The resource is a file on the local computer.| |ftpftp|资源通过 FTP 访问。The resource is accessed through FTP.| |gophergopher|资源可通过 Gopher 协议进行访问。The resource is accessed through the Gopher protocol.| |httphttp|资源可通过 HTTP 访问。The resource is accessed through HTTP.| |httpshttps|资源通过 SSL 加密的 HTTP 访问。The resource is accessed through SSL-encrypted HTTP.| |mailtomailto|该资源是一个电子邮件地址，可通过 SMTP 访问。The resource is an email address and is accessed through SMTP.| |newsnews|资源通过 NNTP 访问。The resource is accessed through NNTP.|

exception.span: 不能将该方案设为无效的方案名称。

span.span: The scheme cannot be set to an invalid scheme name.

summary.span: 返回指定 实例的显示字符串。

span.span: Returns the display string for the specified instance.

returns.span: 包含 非转义显示字符串的字符串。

span.span: The string that contains the unescaped display string of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 属性，或在使用接受端口号 参数的 方法构造 时指定了端口号，则显示字符串将包含 属性值; 如果方法的值设置为-1 以指示默认端口，则为。The display string contains the property value if the property was set or the port was specified when the was constructed using of the methods that accept a port number parameter except for the case when the .property value was set to a value of -1 to indicate the default port. 如果未设置 属性并且构造了 时未指定端口，则显示字符串不包含 属性值。The display string does not contain the property value if the property was not set and a port was not specified when the was constructed. 如果构造函数的 属性或端口号设置为值-1，则显示字符串还不包含 属性值。The display string also does not contain the property value if the property or port number for the constructor was set to a value of -1.
